text: Hellboy is a 2019 movie and a reboot to the 2000s movies. It is based on the Dark Horse Comics character of the same name. Unlike the 2000s movies, many fans and critics didn't like it and it was a box office bomb. == Cast == *David Harbour as Hellboy *Milla Jovovich as Nimue / The Blood Queen *Ian McShane as Professor Broom *Thomas Haden Church as Lobster Jones *Daniel Dae Kim as Ben Daimio ==Other websites== * * Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:Arthurian movies Category:2019 fantasy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Hellboy movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Reboot movies Category:American superhero movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:Canadian fantasy movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:Movies directed by Neil Marshall Category:2010s superhero movies Category:Movies about giants
title: Hellboy (2019 movie)
